abstracts.cdata!:
The Water Supply and Sewerage Project
            consists of: improvement and extension of water supply
            facilities in eight medium size cities (Ciudad Victoria,
            Jalapa, Mexicali, Morelia, Reynosa, Salamanca,
            Tampico-Ciudad Madero and Tuxtla Gutierrez) and sewerage
            services in six of them. The project also includes a
            training program for the executing agency, SRH, and the
            beneficiaries' staff.
